languages.text: {n}Дознаватель оглядывается.{/n} "Что угодно. Даже Черные корабли не защищены от капризов варпа. Поле Геллера, бунт заключенных, банальная поломка священных механизмов... любая из этих причин могла стать фатальной".

{n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель оглядывается.{/n} "Что угодно. Даже Черные корабли не защищены от капризов варпа. Поле Геллера, бунт заключенных, банальная поломка священных механизмов... любая из этих причин могла стать фатальной".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller Field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mira a su alrededor.{/n} «Le podría haber pasado cualquier cosa. Las naves negras no son inmunes a los azares de la disformidad. El campo de Geller, un motín, un error menor en los mecanismos sagrados... Cualquiera de estas causas podría ser letal».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mira a su alrededor.{/n} «Le podría haber pasado cualquier cosa. Las naves negras no son inmunes a los azares de la disformidad. El campo de Geller, un motín, un error menor en los mecanismos sagrados... Cualquiera de estas causas podría ser letal».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは周囲を見渡した。{/n}「何があってもおかしくない。〈黒き船〉でさえ〈歪み〉の影響を避けることはできない。ゲラーフィールド、囚人たちの反乱、聖なる装置のちょっとした不具合…どんな原因でも致命的になりうる」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは周囲を見渡した。{/n}「何があってもおかしくない。〈黒き船〉でさえ〈歪み〉の影響を避けることはできない。ゲラーフィールド、囚人たちの反乱、聖なる装置のちょっとした不具合…どんな原因でも致命的になりうる」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希环视四周。{/n}“什么事情都有可能发生。即便是黑船，也无法避开亚空间变幻莫测的波动。盖勒力场失效、囚犯暴动、神圣的机器发生了小故障……任何一种都可能致命。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希环视四周。{/n}“什么事情都有可能发生。即便是黑船，也无法避开亚空间变幻莫测的波动。盖勒力场失效、囚犯暴动、神圣的机器发生了小故障……任何一种都可能致命。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix regarde autour de lui.{/n} « Tout est possible. Même les Vaisseaux Noirs ne sont pas à l'abri des caprices du Warp. Une défaillance du champ de Geller, une émeute de prisonniers, un dysfonctionnement mineur dans les mécanismes sacrés... Autant de causes qui auraient pu être fatales. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix regarde autour de lui.{/n} « Tout est possible. Même les Vaisseaux Noirs ne sont pas à l'abri des caprices du Warp. Une défaillance du champ de Geller, une émeute de prisonniers, un dysfonctionnement mineur dans les mécanismes sacrés... Autant de causes qui auraient pu être fatales. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sieht sich um.{/n} "Es hätte alles Mögliche damit geschehen können. Selbst Schwarze Schiffe sind nicht immun gegen die Unwägbarkeiten des Warps. Das Gellerfeld, ein Gefangenenaufstand, ein kleiner Fehler in den heiligen Mechanismen ... alles davon hätte tödlich sein können."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sieht sich um.{/n} "Es hätte alles Mögliche damit geschehen können. Selbst Schwarze Schiffe sind nicht immun gegen die Unwägbarkeiten des Warps. Das Gellerfeld, ein Gefangenenaufstand, ein kleiner Fehler in den heiligen Mechanismen ... alles davon hätte tödlich sein können."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix etrafına bakıyor.{/n} "Her şey olmuş olabilir. Kara Gemiler bile öteboyutun tuhaflıklarına bağışık değildir. Geller alanı, mahkûm isyanı, kutsal mekanizmalarda ufak bir arıza... Bunlardan herhangi birinin sonucu ölümcül olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks around.{/n} "Anything could have happened to it. Even Black Ships are not immune to the vagaries of warp. The Geller field, a prisoner riot, a minor glitch in the sacred mechanisms... any one of these causes could have been fatal."
